Finally we looked at the third dish, a cheese and tomato sandwich. How could you possibly go wrong? Well, I'm afraid to say that the chips it came with were again so covered in salt they were virtually inedible. The sandwich itself was very basic. Not terrible. So all in all our lunchtime visit was not a good one. Shame as the reviews had given us high hopes and we were looking forward to some nice food.
Oh, I nearly forgot.... After our food arrived we had to again get up and search for someone to ask for knives and forks. We asked 2 different people and it took about 5 minutes for them to come to our table. The whole time our food was sitting there getting cold... When they did finally arrive the cutlery was dirty!!! Greasy finger prints all over them!!!
Now some of these issues could possibly be overlooked if it was a busy day and the staff were over worked. But we were THE ONLY people there!!!! So how does a restaurant manage to mess things up this badly when there are more staff than customers???
We left feeling ripped off, mouths still dry from the crazy amount of salt on the chips and a huge feeling of disappointment.... I don't think we will be going back anytime soon....
